Source.Name: gamescope
Source.Summary: gamescope - a micro wayland compositor useful for games
Source.Description: gamescope is a micro wayland compositor useful for games. It creates a virtual environment for a game application to run in that helps solves various headaches such as resolution, alt-tabbing, mouse focusing issues etc. Gamescope also tries to remove as many unneccessary copies as it can and should provide better latency.
